title: Trust Me
description: Would you trust a man who dumped you?  Who left you as the dawn broke, after you'd given him almost everything. Your body. Your heart. Fortunately, not your soul.Who is suddenly there again when there's no one left to turn to. After so long...  and looking so fine.Who says he's changed.I shouldn't. Though I want to. But trouble is tracking this ex-Special Forces soldier down. There are secrets. Enemies out there who will never let go. Even those deepest undercover will eventually be found.   ENJOY NELL GREY'S GRIPPING NEW PSYCHOLOGICAL DRAMA
author: Nell  Grey
